BAKERY.BAKERY_BAKERF1: You accidentally dropped the dough which stalled the rest of your orders!
BAKERY.BAKERY_BAKERF2: Too much salt in the bread! Customers left feeling salty~
BAKERY.BAKERY_BAKERF3: Oh no! You left the bread in the oven for too long. Now it's not bread, just toast!
BAKERY.BAKERY_BAKERS1: A job well done in baking today's batch, delicious!
BAKERY.BAKERY_BAKERS2: One of your customers said the bread was excellent!
BAKERY.BAKERY_BAKERS3: You made one of your crispiest, crumpiest, tastiest, yummiest, breads of all-time!
BAKERY.BAKERY_PASTRYCHEFF1: Not in the mood? Your cakes looked... sad.
BAKERY.BAKERY_PASTRYCHEFF2: You mistook a dessert's recipe for another! Who even wants it?
BAKERY.BAKERY_PASTRYCHEFF3: Are you serious? These cookies are way beyond raw!
BAKERY.BAKERY_PASTRYCHEFS1: Those macarons are so colorful and pleasing! A lot of orders today~
BAKERY.BAKERY_PASTRYCHEFS2: You introduced new desserts in the bakery and received great feedback!
BAKERY.BAKERY_PASTRYCHEFS3: A customer liked your decoration on their commissioned cake!
BAKERY.BAKERY_CHOCOLATIERF1: Not too much of the cocoa! Today's chocolate batch is too strong, argh!
BAKERY.BAKERY_CHOCOLATIERF2: You accidentally sold a non-tempered chocolate bar!
BAKERY.BAKERY_CHOCOLATIERF3: You thought the chocolate looked fine, but it tasted funny...
BAKERY.BAKERY_CHOCOLATIERS1: Those chocolate bars turned out so smooth! Smooth like butter~
BAKERY.BAKERY_CHOCOLATIERS2: That chocolate truffle is addicting, sold out in just minutes!
BAKERY.BAKERY_CHOCOLATIERS3: Your stock of cocoa today was so good, that all desserts involving chocolate was chef's kiss!
